idea-plugin.name: BeanMappingKey
idea-plugin.description:
GitHub

对象字段映射插件，它可以自动生成两个类之间的 get/set 方法， 用于替代 BeanUtil、MapStrut 之类的隐式对象转换插件，减少无用劳动的同时又能保留对象转换细节。

An object mapping jetbrains plugin, it will automatically generate the get/set code between the two objects.

It is used to replace implicit object conversion plug-ins such as BeanUtil and MapStrut, reduce useless labor while retaining the details of object conversion.

action.description: Map the fields of the first class to the second class
